<a id="class_StatusIndicator"></a>

# StatusIndicator

**Inherits:** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Application status indicator (aka notification area icon).

\ **Note:** Status indicator is implemented on macOS and Windows.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Signals

<!-- classref-signal -->

**pressed**\ (\ mouse_button\: [int](class_int.md), mouse_position\: [Vector2i](class_vector2i.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_StatusIndicator_signal_pressed)

Emitted when the status indicator is pressed.

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_StatusIndicator_property_icon"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **icon** [ðŸ”—](#class_StatusIndicator_property_icon)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_icon**\ (\ value\: [Texture2D](class_texture2d.md)\ )
- [Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **get_icon**\ (\ )

Status indicator icon.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_StatusIndicator_property_menu"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[NodePath](class_nodepath.md) **menu** = `NodePath("")` [ðŸ”—](#class_StatusIndicator_property_menu)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_menu**\ (\ value\: [NodePath](class_nodepath.md)\ )
- [NodePath](class_nodepath.md) **get_menu**\ (\ )

Status indicator native popup menu. If this is set, the [pressed](class_statusindicator.md#class_StatusIndicator_signal_pressed) signal is not emitted.

\ **Note:** Native popup is only supported if [NativeMenu](class_nativemenu.md) supports [NativeMenu.FEATURE_POPUP_MENU](class_nativemenu.md#class_NativeMenu_constant_FEATURE_POPUP_MENU) feature.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<!-- classref-property -->

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_tooltip**\ (\ value\: [String](class_string.md)\ )
- [String](class_string.md) **get_tooltip**\ (\ )

Status indicator tooltip.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_StatusIndicator_property_visible"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **visible** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#class_StatusIndicator_property_visible)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_visible**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_visible**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the status indicator is visible.

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_StatusIndicator_method_get_rect"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Rect2](class_rect2.md) **get_rect**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_StatusIndicator_method_get_rect)

Returns the status indicator rectangle in screen coordinates. If this status indicator is not visible, returns an empty [Rect2](class_rect2.md).
